text: William "Willy" Rovelli (born March 18, 1980) is a French actor, writer, columnist, comedian, and television personality. He is the chef on the French television show Fort Boyard. ==Early life== William Rovelli was born on March 18, 1980 in Cluses, Haute-Savoie and spent his childhood in Annecy. When he was 17, he moved to Paris.https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl;=en&js;=y&prev;=_t&hl;=en&ie;=UTF-8&u;=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lessorsavoyard.fr%2FActualite%2FAnnecy%2F2011%2F10%2F30%2Farticle_willy_rovelli_l_humoriste_annecien_aux_c.shtml&edit- text;= ==See also== * Fort Boyard ==References== ==External links== * Chronic Willy Europe 1 Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:French male film actors Category:French male television actors Category:French comedians Category:French television personalities Category:French columnists Category:21st-century French male actors Category:People from Haute-Savoie Category:French people of Italian descent
title: Willy Rovelli
